citation: Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2002 (Tas)
text:
Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2002

I make the following order, with the agreement of the Minister for Primary Industries, Water and Environment, under section 5(3) of the Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 .

29 January 2002

P. A. Lennon

Minister for Infrastructure, Energy and Resources

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Mineral Resources Development (Application of Act) Order 2002 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Act applies to certain land
    The Mineral Resources Development Act 1995 is declared to apply to the land specified in Schedule 1 to this order.

SCHEDULE 1 - Area of land

Clause 3

All that area of land comprising about 4.04 hectares bounded by heavy black lines on Plan No. 5389 in the Central Plan Register, a reduced copy of which is set out, by way of illustration only, in Schedule 2 to this order.

SCHEDULE 2 - Plan

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 15 May 2002

This order is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
